description: After a long day of work, sometimes you want to curl up on the couch and drink something comforting. Warm and refreshing with just enough sweetness, it's hard not to enjoy this classic combo!Eximo Noir is made with Facundo Eximo, a rich mahogany rum. A dark brew coffee syrup and Amaro Montenegro give the cocktail its color while the tang of Combier orange liqueur adds sweetness.
name: Eximo Noir
